1111000011110100 1101100111000101 1 -> sum: 1100101010111010, cout: 1
1001110000110100 1000001100011000 0 -> sum: 0001111101001100, cout: 1
1100010111011001 0000000011111111 0 -> sum: 1100011011011000, cout: 0
1001000100110001 1001011110001001 0 -> sum: 0010100010111010, cout: 1
0111101001100110 0000001010101001 1 -> sum: 0111110100010000, cout: 0
0000011000111111 0101111011100110 0 -> sum: 0110010100100101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
